prod_short_desc: Defeat Kylo Ren at the forest castle!
prod_long_desc:
Battle Finn against evil enemy Kylo Ren at the forest castle entrance, featuring sliding doors, wheel-activated exploding wall and collapsing staircase, plus a falling tree function. Includes 5 minifigures: Finn, Maz Kanata, Kylo Ren and 2 First Order Stormtroopers.
Includes 5 minifigures: Finn, Maz Kanata, Kylo Ren and 2 First Order Stormtroopers.
Turn the wheel to explode the wall and collapse the staircase.
Lift the lever and topple the tree to stop the Stormtroopers.
Weapons include Kylo Ren's special Lightsaber, Finn's Lightsaber and 2 blasters.
Accessory elements include Kylo Ren's mask and 2 First Order Stormtrooper helmets.
Recreate unforgettable scenes from Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
Measures over 4” high, 9” wide and5” long.
